mapper.insert: insert into item_commodity_evaluate (evaluate_id,user_id,item_id,commodity_id,evaluate,score) values (#{evaluateId},#{userId},(select item_id from item_commodity_info where commodity_id = #{commodityId}),#{commodityId},#{evaluate},#{score})
mapper.select: select e.evaluate ,e.create_time,e.evaluate_id , e.user_id,u.user_name,u.user_image,e.score from item_commodity_evaluate e left join user_info u on u.uid=e.user_id where commodity_id=#{commodityId} and e.status = 0 and u.status = 0 LIMIT #{page}, #{limit}
select count(*) from item_commodity_evaluate where commodity_id=#{commodityId} and status = 0

select count(*) FROM user_info u JOIN item_commodity_evaluate e ON u.uid = e.user_id WHERE uid IN ( SELECT user_id FROM item_commodity_evaluate WHERE evaluate_id IN ( SELECT evaluate_id FROM item_commodity_evaluate WHERE item_id = #{itemId} ) )
